# Edward Land

Edward Martin Land (14 November 1858 â€“ 2 May 1927) was a Member of the Queensland Legislative Assembly. He represented the seat of Balonne from 1904 to 1927. He was born in the Colony of New South Wales in an area that was split off into the Colony of Queensland the year after his birth.
Land died in 1927 and was buried in Toowong Cemetery.
